item.title: Maximum likelihood estimation
item.author: Author
item.description: In this post, I will show you THE most important technique in inferential statistics: Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE). Â 1. Some data to work with Before we get started, let’s see what type of problem could be solved using MLE. For example, I record the number of visitors of this website each hour from 8:00 am - 12:00 am (p.s. off course this is fake data, and I am probably too optimistic).
